pullrequest.title: Add Appveyor configuration for Windows testing

content.raw:
Yes, those commands are generating (and building) the project for the default generator, i.e. Visual Studio 2013/2015. 
They are convenient to be able to open the generate project with Visual Studio. I don't know if that is possible with NMake, but for sure it is not the standard workflow for Windows developers.
content.html: Yes, those commands are generating (and building) the project for the default generator, i.e. Visual Studio 2013/2015. They are convenient to be able to open the generate project with Visual Studio. I don't know if that is possible with NMake, but for sure it is not the standard workflow for Windows developers.
